termsAndSymbols.description: Slow Growth (change too quiet to notice until it defines you)
Window Into Self (the first glimpse that something inside shifted)
Sunrise Becoming (transformation so gradual it feels natural)
Cosmic From Mundane (meaning rises from the smallest choices)
Growing Around Constraint (adaptation instead of resistance)
Recurring Evolution (every day, just a little more me)
Whispered Awareness (small thoughts that ripple out)
